```{r}
#| include: false

box::use(
  dplyr[filter],
  here[here],
  ../helpers[bibliography, format_entries, make_blocks]
)

here("_credentials.RData") |> load()

bib <- bibliography(
  collection, 
  zotero, 
  selection = c("Article", "Review", "Report", "Manuscript")
)

```

## Peer-reviewed journal articles

```{r}

bib |> 
  filter(collection == "Article") |> 
  format_entries() |> 
  make_blocks()

```
